description: From a series of 12 lithographs produced for Der Mantel (The Coat) by Nicolai Gogol, Kiepenheuer Verlag, Potsdam-Berlin, 1919; man standing with a black coat and hat with his hand on the left raised; his head is tilted and his eyes look downward
inscription: LL in pencil, below image: 7) | LR of sheet, in pencil: Gogol : \"der Mantel.\" / LL of sheet, in pencil: Sonderdruck. / E.61
portfolio: From Plate 7 from Der Mantel (The Coat), Nicolai Gogol, Kiepenheuer Verlag, Potsdam-Berlin, 1919
signed: BC in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté
title: Akaki Saw a Picture of a Pretty Woman in a Window, Plate 7 from Der Mantel (The Coat)
